name: fitness_tip_agent
short_description: Provides daily AI-powered fitness tips with refresh and history retrieval.
description: A workflow that delivers daily AI-generated fitness and wellness tips. Users can get today's cached tip, refresh for a new one, or view their full history of past tips â€” all via a Telex-compatible A2A API.
